procedure_description: A routine checkup assesses health, screens for issues, and updates records.
A follow-up appointment reviews progress, adjusts treatments, and addresses concerns.
A school physical evaluates health, ensures fitness, and clears for activities.
A minor surgery involves small incisions to treat specific medical issues.
An emergency visit addresses urgent health issues requiring immediate medical attention.
Lab tests analyze samples to diagnose conditions and monitor health.
A consultation involves discussing symptoms, concerns, and treatment options.
An X-ray procedure uses radiation to create images of internal structures.
A routine checkup assesses health, screens for issues, and updates records.
A vaccination introduces a pathogen to boost immunity against specific diseases.
